sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.CanReportOnTables</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>CanReportOnTables</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var CanReportOnTables = Class.create();
CanReportOnTables.prototype = {
	initialize: function() {
	},
	
	process: function() {
		var result = [];
		var reportChoiceList = new GlideReportChoiceList();
		reportChoiceList.setCanRead(true);
		reportChoiceList.setNoViews(false);
		reportChoiceList.setNoSystemTables(false);
		reportChoiceList.setSkipScopeRestrictions(true);
		reportChoiceList.generateChoices();
		for (var i = 0; i < reportChoiceList.getSize(); i++)
			result.push('' + reportChoiceList.get(i).getValue());
		
		return result;
	},
	type: 'CanReportOnTables'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2017-09-13 11:23:03</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>8adf3fe353010300ae8dc12b44dc34b7</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>CanReportOnTables</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Reporting" source="com.glideapp.report">08bc38436d2220100acb70b353433067</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8adf3fe353010300ae8dc12b44dc34b7</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2018-06-18 12:11:02</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>574</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
